sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO academicstatus ( oid , name , degree , major , url , imagepath , orgname , confirmed , confirmdate , instructor , course , courseUrl , year , season ) VALUES ( #oid# ,#name# ,#degree# ,#major# ,#url# ,#imagepath# ,#orgname# ,#confirmed# ,#confirmdate# ,#instructor# ,#course# ,#courseUrl# ,#year# ,#season# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , oid , name , degree , major , url , imagepath , orgname , confirmed , DATE_FORMAT(confirmdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS confirmdate , instructor , course , courseUrl , year , season FROM academicstatus WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE academicstatus SET confirmed = 'Y' , confirmdate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM academicstatus WHERE 1 = 1 AND oid = #oid#
